name: Tungsten Network
headAddress: Pountney Hill House, 6 Laurence Pountney Hill
goal:
We are a global electronic invoicing network to deliver legally compliant invoices to our client base. Our service is a fully SaaS oriented offering with little to no burden on the client base.
It is our goal to spread the use of electronic invoicing around the globe and deliver successful projects.
We are also supporting government initiatives to find the right balance between legal requirements and market demands which we have done for the past 12 years both on EU and UN level.
euInitiatives: Invitation to the EU Expert Group on e-Invoicing
